item.description:
I will be posting the agenda for this meeting as the date approaches. Please note that I will be overseas until the 18th and will not be able to respond to your messages in a timely fashion.
If any of you would like to meet up in the meantime, please contact the Assistant Organizer Meghan Campbell or post on the message board.
Hope to see you all on the 20th!!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: May BRBN meeting
